name: Baltimora
description: '''Baltimora''' was an Italian music project from [[Milan]], active from 1984 to 1987. They are best known for their 1985 single "[[Tarzan Boy]]" and are often considered a [[one-hit wonder]] in the United Kingdom and the United States. In other European countries, including their native Italy, Baltimora scored a follow-up hit "[[Woody Boogie]]" the same year.
